argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | rspcdvinvd.1 | |- ( ( ph /\ x = A ) -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) |
| 2 |  | rspcdvinvd.2 | |- ( ph -> A e. B ) |
| 3 |  | rspcdvinvd.3 | |- ( ph -> A. x e. B ps ) |
| 4 | 2, 1 | #P_rspcdv | |- ( ph -> ( A. x e. B ps -> ch ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_mpd | |- ( ph -> ch ) |
